description.p: Edit photos and manage a large collection. Includes thumbnail browser/navigator, RAW file conversion, a comprehensive set of edit functions working in 24-bit color, edit selected image objects or areas independently from background, area copy/paste within and across images, file versioning, batch operations, scriptable batch editing, HDR, HDF, panorama, image stacking, photomontage, albums (alternate views), slide show with animated transitions and zoom, metadata edit and report, image search using any metadata and/or folder/file names, geographic maps with clickable markers to show images at location.
